description: gopack: rename pack, move to go-tool directory

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5598045/diff/5001/src/cmd/go/build.go
File src/cmd/go/build.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5598045/diff/5001/src/cmd/go/build.go#newcode1000
src/cmd/go/build.go:1000: return b.run(p.Dir, p.ImportPath, b.goroot+"/bin/go-tool/pack", "grc", mkAbs(objDir, afile), absOfiles)
filepath.Join(b.goroot, "bin/go-tool/pack")

will fix the slashes on Windows.

*** Submitted as ac826bd8cec3 ***

gopack: rename pack, move to go-tool directory

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5598045

http://codereview.appspot.com/5598045/diff/5002/src/cmd/go/build.go
File src/cmd/go/build.go (left):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5598045/diff/5002/src/cmd/go/build.go#oldcode1150
src/cmd/go/build.go:1150: cgoCFLAGS = append(cgoCFLAGS, "-I", obj)
Was this change intended, Rob?

On Feb 1, 2012, at 9:03 AM, n13m3y3r@gmail.com wrote:

> 
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5598045/diff/5002/src/cmd/go/build.go
> File src/cmd/go/build.go (left):
> 
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5598045/diff/5002/src/cmd/go/build.go#oldcode1150
> src/cmd/go/build.go:1150: cgoCFLAGS = append(cgoCFLAGS, "-I", obj)
> Was this change intended, Rob?

no, and i have no idea how it happened. i'll leave it for rsc to repair.

-rob

subject: code review 5598045: gopack: rename pack, move to go-tool directory
